title: 【OOC】更多刷怪蛋原版MOD1.8
author: 新之助~
txt_content:
本帖最后由 新之助~ 于 2016-12-17 20:23 编辑 

===========================================================================

更多刷怪蛋MOD

===========================================================================

介绍

===========================================================================

更多刷怪蛋MOD是第一个比较实用的MOD
刷怪蛋一共12个！！全部都是物品栏没有的
因为我觉得有一些人英语不好比如我
这个MOD做了2天 因为找不到生物ID
迷茫啊~~~~~


===========================================================================

生物

===========================================================================





驴



骡



骷髅马



僵尸马



杀手兔



凋灵骷髅



远古守卫者



雪人



铁傀儡



末影龙



凋灵



巨人



===========================================================================

指令

===========================================================================


/summon FallingSand ~ ~1 ~ {Tile:152,Time:10,Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"fill ~ ~-32 ~1 ~ ~-1 ~1 redstone_block"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"summon FallingSand ~2 ~-12 ~6 {Block:"minecraft:redstone_block",Time:1}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"summon FallingSand ~3 ~-12 ~10 {}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"summon FallingSand ~1 ~-11 ~10 {}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"summon FallingSand ~3 ~"},Riding:{id:FallingSand,Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"/execute @e[type=Bat,name=Guardian1] ~ ~ ~ summon Guardian ~ ~ ~ {Elder:1}"},Riding:{}}}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"summon FallingSand ~1 ~-9 ~9 {id:FallingSand,Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"/execute ~4 ~1 ~11 quartz_block 0"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"fill ~ ~ ~5 ~4 ~2 ~11 stained_glass wall_sign 1 replace {Text1:"{text:\\"~作者~\\",bold:False,italic:False,underlined:False,strikethrough:False,color:black,clickEvent:{action:run_command,value:\\"fill ~2 ~-1 ~ ~-2 ~2 ~8 air\\"}}",Text4:"{text:\\"~点击关闭系统~\\",bold:False,italic:False,underlined:False,strikethrough:False,color:black,clickEvent:{action:run_command,value:\\"fill ~2 ~-1 ~ ~-2 ~2 ~8 air\\"}}"}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"/give @a spawn_egg 1 65 {display:{Name:"VillagerGolem"}}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"/give @a spawn_egg 1 65 {display:{Name:"SnowMan"}}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"/give @a spawn_egg 1 65 {display:{Name:"Guardian1"}}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"/give @a spawn_egg 1 65 {display:{Name:"EnderDragon"}}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"/give @a spawn_egg 1 65 {display:{Name:"Skeleton"}}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"/give @a spawn_egg 1 65 {display:{Name:"Giant"}}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"/give @a spawn_egg 1 65 {display:{Name:"WitherBoss"}}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"/give @a spawn_egg 1 65 {display:{Name:"Rabbit99"}}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"/give @a spawn_egg 1 65 {display:{Name:"EntityHorse4"}}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"/give @a spawn_egg 1 65 false"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"/scoreboard objectives add tnt dummy"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"/gamerule commandBlockOutput false"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"setblock ~ ~-1 ~1 redstone_block"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"fill ~ ~ ~ ~ ~36 ~1 air"}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}复制代码
===========================================================================

教程

===========================================================================


/gamerule commandBlockOutput false
关闭提示信息
/scoreboard objectives add tnt dummy
创建一个叫tnt的计分板
/gamerule mobGriefing false
关闭生物破坏（他们太恐怖了~~~）
/give @a spawn_egg 1 65 {display:{Name:"EntityHorse1"}}

给我一个叫EntityHorse1的蝙蝠刷怪蛋
/scoreboard players add @e[type=Bat] tnt 1
不停的给蝙蝠刷1分

/execute @e[score_tnt_min=2] ~ ~ ~ kill @e[type=Bat]
删除分数为2的蝙蝠
/execute @e[type=Bat,name=EntityHorse1] ~ ~ ~ summon EntityHorse ~ ~ ~ {Type:1}

探测有一个叫EntityHorse1 在他身上放一个驴





===========================================================================

@大法



===========================================================================

谢谢师傅@FHC红石的耐心教导
感谢群组@地上的灰尘 @lishanglin 
不明真相的吃瓜群众 @籽岷 @quangegegege 



===========================================================================

replies.author: ruhuasiyu
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 ruhuasiyu 于 2016-12-17 20:34 编辑 
新之助~ 发表于 2016-12-17 20:22
好吧好吧 下次一定
而且如果你在1.11中，你可以用生命值为1且剩余时间为1的vex来代替蝙蝠，这样的vex召唤出后会立即消失

give @p minecraft:spawn_egg 1 0 {EntityTag:{id:minecraft:vex,Health:1,Tags:["vgolem"],Silent:1,LifeTicks:1},display:{Name:"生成 铁傀儡"}}
execute @e[tag=vgolem] ~ ~ ~ summon villager_golem复制代码

replies.author: ruhuasiyu
replies.txt_content:
以后发的时候最好说下版本。
比如说你这个肯定是1.10-

在1.11中驴、骡、骷髅马、僵尸马、凋灵骷髅、远古守卫者都有刷怪蛋了。
